scripts.swagger: npm run swagger-shop && npm run swagger-user && npm run swagger-product && npm run swagger-payment
scripts.swagger-shop: rimraf libs/swagger/src/swagger-shop && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./apps/shop/swagger/swagger.yml -g typescript-fetch -o libs/swagger/src/swagger-shop --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,enumPropertyNaming=original,useSingleRequestParameter=true,typescriptThreePlus=true
scripts.swagger-user: rimraf libs/swagger/src/swagger-user && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./apps/user/swagger/swagger.yml -g typescript-fetch -o libs/swagger/src/swagger-user --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,enumPropertyNaming=original,useSingleRequestParameter=true,typescriptThreePlus=true
scripts.swagger-product: rimraf libs/swagger/src/swagger-product && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./apps/product/swagger/swagger.yml -g typescript-fetch -o libs/swagger/src/swagger-product --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,enumPropertyNaming=original,useSingleRequestParameter=true,typescriptThreePlus=true
scripts.swagger-payment: rimraf libs/swagger/src/swagger-payment && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./apps/payment/swagger/swagger.yml -g typescript-fetch -o libs/swagger/src/swagger-payment --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,enumPropertyNaming=original,useSingleRequestParameter=true,typescriptThreePlus=true
